data.text: @MikePortnoy Praying for your health bud! Stay safe and get well! C U at #Morsefest2022
@MikePortnoy Thatâ€™s what my basement looked like 5 weeks ago!  Hang in there!  Get well soon!

@MikePortnoy Many years ago someone said "the doctor prescribed the cure is more cowbell". I think this is not the case, but I'm sure the best cure is to increase your daily dose of rock and roll! Get well soon!
@MikePortnoy Take at least 15,000 IU of vitamin D , 1000mg of vitamin C and 50mg Zinc daily, you will start feeling much better

@MikePortnoy What the hell is that thing on the right? "The soft taste of solid rock" !? I've never eat a rock, I've heard someone sing "hard as rock". My logic guess me that a rock could never have a soft taste...so rock on babe!

@MikePortnoy And much more important than a PCR test. Check you Vitamin D levels. If it's under 20, take massive doses to get it up. Get some sun. studies show that people with low Vit D are 14Xs more likely to get severe cases of illness.
